narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Madison Leffingwell is a Case Manager/Care Coordinator provider based in Wheelersburg, OH. From 2024-03 through 2024-07, this provider received $60K in Medicaid payments across 846 claims serving 376 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 93% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: H0036 (H0036). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
